Thanks for that info on the plugin, something for me to think about.

Hi Sarah-Jane, 

Confirming we have added the menu item to the site : ) 

Regarding the events plugin, depending on what type of information and functionality you require, the events plugin would be overkill. We have used that on other clients sites and it can slow things down.... in particular, I wouldn't recommend you run it on your site. 

My suggestion would be to:

  1. Setup a new page for the event
  2. Create a registration form using Gravity Forms *which is already on your site*
  3. Then you can add it things like max number of registrations, confirmation emails etc. 
It's essentially giving you everything you would need (I think). The event's plugin comes with other features such as table allocations, payments etc. So maybe if you provide exactly what you need to achieve, I can tell you if it's possible with your current setup.

Hopefully that makes sense?

Hi Heath,

Yes please go ahead with linking the events tabs to the landing page: https://insights.axiomworkplaces.com.au/en-au/webinar-2-0

I also need to ask about something else that just came up today. Can you tell me what is involved with installing the following plugin to our site?

https://demo.theeventscalendar.com/virtual-events/

https://wordpress.org/plugins/the-events-calendar/

It has been recommended by a third party who wants to collaborate on events with us and they have added the plugin to their site (https://www.tenanttalks.ca/#events)

I don't know how it works so wanted to check steps with you first, in case it's a bigger development job that I need to involve Bc.

In order to install the plugin, I assume I first need to have a dedicated Events page (like Tenant Talks above)? For the moment I just want to get the landing page up, and can replace it with an events page at a later date, but how would the plugin on both our sites be connected to display an event calendar? Also, would the plugin have any particular style/format that would conflict with the design of our website?

Kindest Regards,

Sarah-Jane Lamont

Client Relations Executive Assistant

M 0421 478 501

Great solution!! Did you want us to link it up now?

https://insights.axiomworkplaces.com.au/en-au/webinar-2-0

Hi Sarah-Jane, 

Sure we can do this for you. It would be a 20min task and all we would need is the zoom link and we can set it up. 

Let me know if you would like us to proceed?
@heath I can work on this one however client is asking for a quote, i think you should check this. Thanks!

Hi Heath,


Can you please quote what it would cost to add another option to the navigation bar at the top of the home page titled "Our events" - displayed straight after Our insights.


Secondly, as we don't have a web page specifically for all our events yet, I would want to be able to periodically update where this tab links to i.e. for right now I'd want it to link to the Zoom registration page of our upcoming event in September and once that has occurred I would want to update the link for the Zoom registration page for our next event taking place in November.


Do you think this would work in the interim until we have a dedicated Events page?


Kindest Regards,


Sarah-Jane Lamont
